added_value_placeholder: Ex: Increase conversion from users to paid clients
milestone_placeholder: Ex: Publish Beta version of the mobile app
problems_with_kr: Please type a Key Result, Click here if you need help defining it
problems_with_objective: Please type an Objective, Click here if you need help defining it
problems_with_responsible: Please select a responsible for the OKR
are_you_sure_delete_kr: Are you sure you want to delete the Key Result: {{kr}}? There's no way to recover it
are_you_sure_delete_objective: Are you sure you want to delete the Objective {{objective}}? There's no way to recover it
objective_placeholder: What Objective do you want to accomplish?
houston_progress_spaceship: Your spaceship has just come closer to the goal.
will_add_key_result: You will add a Key Result to the Objective: {{objective}}
are_you_sure_delete_initiative: Are your sure you want to delete the initiative: {{initiative}}?
no_objectives_yet: This team does not have any OKR for this cycle yet
edit_title_confirmation: You will delete Key Results previously created, Are you sure?
edit_message_confirmation: All the data regarding these key results will be lost
start_x_end_y: Start in {x} and the goal is to reach {y}
key_result_placeholder: How will you measure that you are progressing towards your Objective?
private_explanation: Only the members of the team can see this OKR
